languages.text: "Я и себе пайков набрал, и семье брата... с тех пор, как его в жернове перемололо, худо им приходилось. Ну теперь ничего, авось все детки выживут!"

"I got rations for myself, and for my brother's family... They've had it tough ever since he got chewed up in that grinder. Well, now maybe things will turn out all right and all the kids will survive!"
languages.original_text: "Я и себе пайков набрал, и семье брата... с тех пор, как его в жернове перемололо, худо им приходилось. Ну теперь ничего, авось все детки выживут!"

traits.locale_text: "I got rations for myself, and for my brother's family... They've had it tough ever since he got chewed up in that grinder. Well, now maybe things will turn out all right and all the kids will survive!"

"I got rations for myself, and for my brother's family... They've had it tough ever since he got chewed up in that grinder. Well, now maybe things will turn out all right and all the kids will survive!"

"I got rations for myself, and for my brother's family... They've had it tough ever since he got chewed up in that grinder. Well, now maybe things will turn out all right and all the kids will survive!"

languages.text: 「私は自分の分と、兄弟の家族のための食糧を手に入れました…彼があの粉砕機で粉々になって以来、彼らは大変な思いをしています。でも、今は多分すべてうまくいくと思います。子供たちも全員が生き残るかもしれない！」
languages.original_text: "I got rations for myself, and for my brother's family... They've had it tough ever since he got chewed up in that grinder. Well, now maybe things will turn out all right and all the kids will survive!"

traits.locale_text: 「私は自分の分と、兄弟の家族のための食糧を手に入れました…彼があの粉砕機で粉々になって以来、彼らは大変な思いをしています。でも、今は多分すべてうまくいくと思います。子供たちも全員が生き残るかもしれない！」

languages.text: « J'ai obtenu des rations pour moi et pour la famille de mon frère... C'est pas facile pour eux depuis qu'il est passé dans le broyeur. Mais peut-être que les choses vont s'arranger et que les enfants vont survivre, finalement ! »
languages.original_text: "I got rations for myself, and for my brother's family... They've had it tough ever since he got chewed up in that grinder. Well, now maybe things will turn out all right and all the kids will survive!"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai obtenu des rations pour moi et pour la famille de mon frère... C'est pas facile pour eux depuis qu'il est passé dans le broyeur. Mais peut-être que les choses vont s'arranger et que les enfants vont survivre, finalement ! »

languages.text: “我为我自己和我兄弟的家人备好了口粮……自从他被绞肉机绞碎之后，他的家人日子就很不好过。不过现在，说不定一切都会好起来，说不定那些孩子一个都不会饿死呢！”
languages.original_text: "I got rations for myself, and for my brother's family... They've had it tough ever since he got chewed up in that grinder. Well, now maybe things will turn out all right and all the kids will survive!"

traits.locale_text: “我为我自己和我兄弟的家人备好了口粮……自从他被绞肉机绞碎之后，他的家人日子就很不好过。不过现在，说不定一切都会好起来，说不定那些孩子一个都不会饿死呢！”

languages.text: «Tengo raciones para mí y para la familia de mi hermano... La han estado pasando canutas desde que se lo tragó aquella trituradora. Bueno, ¡ahora quizás les vaya mejor y las criaturas sobrevivan!».
languages.original_text: "I got rations for myself, and for my brother's family... They've had it tough ever since he got chewed up in that grinder. Well, now maybe things will turn out all right and all the kids will survive!"

traits.locale_text: «Tengo raciones para mí y para la familia de mi hermano... La han estado pasando canutas desde que se lo tragó aquella trituradora. Bueno, ¡ahora quizás les vaya mejor y las criaturas sobrevivan!».

languages.text: "Ich habe Rationen für mich und für die Familie meines Bruders ... Die haben es schwer, seit er in das Mahlwerk geraten ist. Aber vielleicht wird jetzt alles gut und die Kinder überleben alle!"
languages.original_text: "I got rations for myself, and for my brother's family... They've had it tough ever since he got chewed up in that grinder. Well, now maybe things will turn out all right and all the kids will survive!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Rationen für mich und für die Familie meines Bruders ... Die haben es schwer, seit er in das Mahlwerk geraten ist. Aber vielleicht wird jetzt alles gut und die Kinder überleben alle!"

languages.text: "Kendime ve kardeşimin ailesine yetecek kadar kumanya aldım... Kardeşim öğütücüye düştüğünden beri zorluk çekiyorlar. Belki şimdi durumları düzelir de çocuklar ölmez!"
languages.original_text: "I got rations for myself, and for my brother's family... They've had it tough ever since he got chewed up in that grinder. Well, now maybe things will turn out all right and all the kids will survive!"

traits.locale_text: "Kendime ve kardeşimin ailesine yetecek kadar kumanya aldım... Kardeşim o öğütücüye düştüğünden beri zorluk çekiyorlar. Belki şimdi durumları düzelir de çocukların tümü yaşar!"
